entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
